positions.subtitle: Tata Motors
positions.description: ‘Fast Track Selection Scheme (FTSS)’ is a Young Leaders' programme that provides a unique opportunity for 2% of the applicants to accelerate the pace of their careers at Tata Motors. The selects go through a two year developmental journey to develop organisation knowledge, and leadership competencies through practical projects.Projects: Sustainability1. Internal Carbon Pricing2. Carbon offset strategy3. Digitization of Sustainability KPIsProjects: Strategy1. Multi Modal Logistics park and its impact on TML Business2. Connected commercial vehicles
positions.title: Fast Track Selection Scheme Probationer
positions.description_html:
‘Fast Track Selection Scheme (FTSS)’ is a Young Leaders' programme that provides a unique opportunity for 2% of the applicants to accelerate the pace of their careers at Tata Motors. The selects go through a two year developmental journey to develop organisation knowledge, and leadership competencies through practical projects.

Projects: Sustainability

1. Internal Carbon Pricing
2. Carbon offset strategy
3. Digitization of Sustainability KPIs

Projects: Strategy

1. Multi Modal Logistics park and its impact on TML Business
2. Connected commercial vehicles

positions.subtitle: Tata Motors
positions.description: •	Lead the Marketing Mix Modelling project on behalf of the TML team with the intended savings of Rs. 4 Cr compared to last FY at the same volume•	Designed the execution plan for SCV Sales 360 initiative, to bring all the information required to review any geography under one umbrella & Implemented the pipeline review mechanism for the same•	Developed the anomaly detection system to obtain the list of areas that needs to be focused to improve the sales of Passenger Vehicles in the country•	Developed the customer profiling dashboard and provided insights pertaining to the variations in customer profiles with respect to time / brand / territories
positions.title: Senior Manager - Central Analytics
positions.description_html:
• Lead the Marketing Mix Modelling project on behalf of the TML team with the intended savings of Rs. 4 Cr compared to last FY at the same volume
• Designed the execution plan for SCV Sales 360 initiative, to bring all the information required to review any geography under one umbrella & Implemented the pipeline review mechanism for the same
• Developed the anomaly detection system to obtain the list of areas that needs to be focused to improve the sales of Passenger Vehicles in the country
• Developed the customer profiling dashboard and provided insights pertaining to the variations in customer profiles with respect to time / brand / territories

positions.subtitle: Tata Motors
positions.description: •	Developed action plan for region taking a consultative approach and interaction with all stake holders and Sales Managers•	Established process oriented methods aimed at moving to "Sales by Design" for a team of 15 Territory sales managers •	Developed tools using VBA, and implemented across India and SAARC countries within a 1 year period•	Ensured adherence of implemented process through proper communication at various stake holder levels•	Reported weekly metrics of process and escalated in case of non-adherence at regional level to Steer Committee•	Prepared the agenda, minutes and kept track of follow ups regarding performance and strategy meetings•	Acted as a POC for the value added services business of Tata Motors (AMC and Tata Ok) to improve revenue generation from these•	Received "STARZ Award" given for the best employees across the region
positions.title: Regional Project Manager - GTM and Digital
positions.description_html:
• Developed action plan for region taking a consultative approach and interaction with all stake holders and Sales Managers
• Established process oriented methods aimed at moving to "Sales by Design" for a team of 15 Territory sales managers
• Developed tools using VBA, and implemented across India and SAARC countries within a 1 year period
• Ensured adherence of implemented process through proper communication at various stake holder levels
• Reported weekly metrics of process and escalated in case of non-adherence at regional level to Steer Committee
• Prepared the agenda, minutes and kept track of follow ups regarding performance and strategy meetings
• Acted as a POC for the value added services business of Tata Motors (AMC and Tata Ok) to improve revenue generation from these
• Received "STARZ Award" given for the best employees across the region

positions.subtitle: Tata Motors
positions.description: Dealer Profitability Improvement - Body Indent Works (BIW) and Paint workshop* Selected to a team of 6 people who remotely operate to implement the project in pilot phase* Conducted customer survey to identify the pain points specifically in terms of BIW and Paint workshop to determine the pain points of customers, dealer workshops and technicians* Designed the methodology on how to address the pain points shared by customers using infrastructure and manpower efficiency improvements* Set the milestones, established the timelines and developed Gantt chart for the project to monitor effectively against each initiative / milestone* Documentation of the project progress and scale up can be done if and when required
positions.title: Project Associate
positions.description_html:
Dealer Profitability Improvement - Body Indent Works (BIW) and Paint workshop
* Selected to a team of 6 people who remotely operate to implement the project in pilot phase
* Conducted customer survey to identify the pain points specifically in terms of BIW and Paint workshop to determine the pain points of customers, dealer workshops and technicians
* Designed the methodology on how to address the pain points shared by customers using infrastructure and manpower efficiency improvements
* Set the milestones, established the timelines and developed Gantt chart for the project to monitor effectively against each initiative / milestone
* Documentation of the project progress and scale up can be done if and when required

positions.subtitle: Tata Motors
positions.description: Implementation of GTME in Internation Business (IB) in SAARC Countries:* Selected to a team of 3 from the country to assist in scale up of GTME across SAARC countries* Developed VBA tool to bring the concept of beat plan (whom to meet and when to meet basis criteria set by the managers) to life for IB basis inputs shared by the IB Sales Managers* Coach the team on review cadence and tracking mechanisms to ensure adherence of all initiatives
positions.title: Project Associate
positions.description_html:
Implementation of GTME in Internation Business (IB) in SAARC Countries:
* Selected to a team of 3 from the country to assist in scale up of GTME across SAARC countries
* Developed VBA tool to bring the concept of beat plan (whom to meet and when to meet basis criteria set by the managers) to life for IB basis inputs shared by the IB Sales Managers
* Coach the team on review cadence and tracking mechanisms to ensure adherence of all initiatives

experience.title: Management Trainee
experience.description: * Worked in Go To Market Excellence team for South India, Medium and Heavy commercial vehiclesImplementation of various initiatives at regional level for the Line of Business* Ensure review mechanism and all reporting are proper to improve the market share through improvement of processes and adherence* Developed training materials for the use at the region, which was widely circulated across the country* Customer discovery process conducted with face to face interviews to be used for offer design and other recommendations to the business* Designed the concept of beat plan effectiveness which got accepted and is now followed across as a standard parameter in GTME across Tata Motors* Nominated by central team to train all regional project Managers to initiate the scale up of GTME initiatives across the country
experience.description_html: * Worked in Go To Market Excellence team for South India, Medium and Heavy commercial vehiclesImplementation of various initiatives at regional level for the Line of Business* Ensure review mechanism and all reporting are proper to improve the market share through improvement of processes and adherence* Developed training materials for the use at the region, which was widely circulated across the country* Customer discovery process conducted with face to face interviews to be used for offer design and other recommendations to the business* Designed the concept of beat plan effectiveness which got accepted and is now followed across as a standard parameter in GTME across Tata Motors* Nominated by central team to train all regional project Managers to initiate the scale up of GTME initiatives across the country

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Assessing the current ways of working of the Maintenance division's exclusive distributor sales men•	Understand the sales operation and daily route plan followed in 14 districts for CP-MNT Division across 3 states•	Created a score card with 9 metrics based on which an ISR’s day-to-day activities can be monitored by company•	Measured the regulatory compliance of different geographies and identified gaps in the sales operations norms•	Used statistical tools to compare the performance of TSIs against respective ISRs to measure impact of training•	Identified industry wide practices by benchmarking with 20 companies from FMCG and FMCD Industries •	Developed a purchase order form, taking the inputs from ISRs which is implemented throughout the country•	Designed and implemented the ISR engagement activities to improve operational effectiveness of CP-MNT•	Recognized with a Pre-Placement Interview for my exceptional performance during the summer internship
experience.description_html: Assessing the current ways of working of the Maintenance division's exclusive distributor sales men• Understand the sales operation and daily route plan followed in 14 districts for CP-MNT Division across 3 states• Created a score card with 9 metrics based on which an ISR’s day-to-day activities can be monitored by company• Measured the regulatory compliance of different geographies and identified gaps in the sales operations norms• Used statistical tools to compare the performance of TSIs against respective ISRs to measure impact of training• Identified industry wide practices by benchmarking with 20 companies from FMCG and FMCD Industries • Developed a purchase order form, taking the inputs from ISRs which is implemented throughout the country• Designed and implemented the ISR engagement activities to improve operational effectiveness of CP-MNT• Recognized with a Pre-Placement Interview for my exceptional performance during the summer internship

We had organized a medical camp, a seminar of Pain and Paliative care unit, Cleaning of campus premises and other activities.I was also a Volunteer of Sarabhai Institute of Science and Technolog, Trivandrum. organizations.title: SOMA (SJMSOM Association)
organizations.description: Elected member of the SOMA (SJMSOM Association), the student body of SJMSOM. The key objectives of which are as follows.* To promote synergy among the students and interest groups from both within the school and the Institute by promoting interactions and exchange of ideas.* To facilitate on the regular basis the faculty student interface.* To organize and co-ordinate events of interest to its members, such as seminars, distinguished lectures, events, workshops etc.* To forge links with the School alumni and the industry, and explore areas of co-operative work.* Through the above activities, build initiative and leadership skills among its members.

organizations.title: SISTEM Council, (Sarabhai Institute's Students' Teachers' and Management Council)
organizations.description: SISTEM Council is the Students Council of Sarabhai Institute of Science and Technology. The key highlights of the activities I performed in my tenure are as follows.•Designed the organization chart & action plan for the college to follow•Recommended the list of 16 students for the different roles of the Council•Coordinated the College week events with a footfall of about 1500 people
